name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and Hi-Res Audio support. Features adaptive sound control and multipoint connection.

name: USB-C Fast Charging Cable (6ft)
description: Braided nylon USB-C to USB-C cable with 100W Power Delivery support. Compatible with laptops, phones, and tablets. 480Mbps data transfer.

name: Mechanical Keyboard RGB
description: Full-size mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX Brown switches, per-key RGB backlighting, USB-C connectivity, and programmable macros. Hot-swappable switches.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof IPX7 portable speaker with 360-degree sound, 20-hour battery, and built-in microphone for calls. Supports stereo pairing.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: 15W Qi-certified wireless charging pad with LED indicator. Compatible with iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, and all Qi-enabled devices. Includes USB-C cable.

name: Ergonomic Wireless Mouse
description: Vertical ergonomic mouse with 4000 DPI optical sensor, 6 programmable buttons, and dual-mode connectivity (Bluetooth + 2.4GHz). Rechargeable battery lasts 3 months.

name: 4K Webcam with Ring Light
description: Ultra HD 4K webcam with built-in adjustable ring light, auto-focus, dual noise-cancelling microphones, and privacy shutter. Works with Zoom, Teams, and Google Meet.

name: Laptop Stand Adjustable
description: Aluminum adjustable laptop stand with ventilated design. Supports laptops 10-17 inches. Foldable and portable. Ergonomic height adjustment up to 6 inches.

name: Smart Power Strip
description: WiFi-enabled power strip with 4 smart outlets, 3 USB ports, and surge protection. Works with Alexa and Google Home. Schedule and monitor energy usage via app.

name: Noise-Cancelling Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with hybrid ANC, spatial audio, and transparency mode. 8-hour battery with 32-hour charging case. IPX5 water resistant.

name: USB-C Hub 7-in-1
description: Multiport USB-C hub with HDMI 4K@60Hz, 2x USB-A 3.0, USB-C data, SD/microSD card readers, and 100W pass-through charging. Aluminum body.

name: Smart LED Desk Lamp
description: Eye-care LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures, auto-dimming, and built-in wireless charging base. Touch controls and voice assistant compatible.
